title: How to download my music to iMovie - Quora

response.answer_text: You most definitely can put up your own music on iMovie. All you have to do is download the music you want and import it into the app or software if your using it on a Mac or PC via the “Import” button. Trim it according to how much you want it and drag it where you want and your video will have the music you wanted in it. Also ensure you give due credits wherever required.

Yeah sure, Just download the music you want and import it into the app via the “Import” button. Trim it and drag it where you want and voila, your video will have your own music in it. PS: Remember that if you are uploading this video to YouTube, you will need to discern whether the music is copyrighted.
